title: LIVE: SONA 2017 build up | News24
text:
Share Icon 
A view of the stage at The Grand Parade. 
This is so people can watch his speech on a big screen, and possibly get to see Zuma and other ANC leaders afterwards. 
The party had said it was an attempt to break down the impression that its leaders were out of touch with the people. 09:02 Copy URL: Share Icon 
Security are briefed outside the Grand Parade, where the ANC will host a “people’s assembly” at 15:00. 09:00 Police presence is already heavy the Cape Town CBD, with roads closed around Parliament in anticipation for the event this evening. Share 
Curtailing government spending, the possibility of moving Parliament from Cape Town to Pretoria and the balancing the country’s books through investments were some of the highlights of President Jacob Zuma’s 2016 SONA.
